ABOUT.TITLE: About
ABOUT.SUMMARY_1: Hey there, I'm Harshit,an 18-year-old student pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Information Technology (IT). My passion for technology and programming has led me to excel in various programming languages such as PHP, Ruby, and C++. I have a strong foundation in web development, which allows me to create dynamic and interactive websites.
ABOUT.SUMMARY_2: One of my key strengths lies in database management and SQL. I'm adept at designing and optimizing databases to ensure efficient data storage and retrieval. Staying up-to-date with the latest trends and advancements in the tech world is something I take seriously, as it helps me keep my skills relevant and in tune with the rapidly evolving industry.
ABOUT.SUMMARY_3: As a student of IT, I am constantly seeking opportunities to learn and grow, both academically and professionally. Whether it's exploring new programming languages, tackling challenging coding projects, or staying informed about emerging technologies, I am committed to staying at the forefront of the IT field.
ABOUT.SUMMARY_4: I'm excited about the endless possibilities that the world of technology offers and look forward to contributing my skills and knowledge to make a meaningful impact in this ever-evolving industry.

HIGH SCHOOL.RESUME_1: I completed my high school from INDIA. I exceeded in Academics and Sports .
HIGH SCHOOL.RESUME_2: I was the captain of the school football team and won many trophies for the school.
HIGH SCHOOL.RESUME_3: I was also the head of the school's computer club and won many competitions for the school.

DEAKIN UNIVERSITY.RESUME_1: After completing High School, I decide to arrive Australia and study at Deakin University. I'm currently pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Information Technology.
DEAKIN UNIVERSITY.RESUME_2: With a focus on practical skills and hands-on experience, I expect to graduate from this program in 2026 with a thorough understanding of how to be an IT expert while enjoying my UNI life and focus on developing myself as well.

CURRENT.RESUME_1: Right now, im focusing on developing my skills, partaking in open competitions and working on my own projects.
